title: Dev Night Out @ Puttshack!
description:
Join fellow game developers on June 21st as we conquer Puttshack, a new concept of mini golf with patented technology, world-class dining and high-energy vibes!Â  After, we will discuss what criticisms we have with this location-based entertainment and what we would change given the chance!


For full details, including the address, and to RSVP see: https://www.meetup.com/st-louis-game-developers/events/308068741
location: Puttshack  - 3730 Foundry Way Suite 100,  - St Louis, MO, US
